3 # Command Status
4 from niryo_robot_msgs.msg import CommandStatus
5 
6 __all__ = [

15 
16 class ToolValidationException(Exception):
17  pass
18 
19 
20 #
21 # Base class for any tool
22 #
23 class Tool(object):
24  def __init__(self, tool_id, tool_name, tool_transformation, tools_state, ros_command_interface):
25  self._functions_dict = {}
26  self._id = tool_id
27  self._name = tool_name
28  self._tools_state = tools_state
29  self.ros_command_interface = ros_command_interface
30  self._is_active = False
31  self.available_commands = []
32  self._tool_transformation = tool_transformation
33 
34  # To override
35  @staticmethod
36  def get_type():
37  raise NotImplementedError
38 
39  # To override
40  def validate_command(self, cmd):
41  raise NotImplementedError
42 
43  def __enter__(self):
44  self._is_active = True
45 
46  def __exit__(self, exc_type, exc_val, exc_tb):
47  self._is_active = False
48 
49  def is_active(self):
50  return self._is_active
51 
52  def get_id(self):
53  return self._id
54 
55  @property
56  def name(self):
57  return self._name
58 
59  @property
60  def transformation(self):
61  return self._tool_transformation
62 
63  def set_available_commands(self, cmd_list):
64  self.available_commands = cmd_list
65 
66  def get_available_commands(self):
67  return self.available_commands
68 
69  def __call__(self, function_name, *args):
70  return self._functions_dict[function_name](*args)
71 
72  def __str__(self):
73  return "Tool {} of type {} with ID {}".format(self._name, self.get_type(), self._id)
74 
75  def __repr__(self):
76  return self.__str__()
77 
78  def remap(self, value, old_min, old_max, new_min, new_max):
79  """Remap given value from an old range to a new range
80  """
81  return new_min + (new_max - new_min) * ((value - old_min) / (old_max - old_min))
82 
83 
84 class NoTool(Tool):
85  def __init__(self, tool_id, tool_name, tool_transformation, tools_state, ros_command_interface):
86  super(NoTool, self).__init__(tool_id, tool_name, tool_transformation, tools_state, ros_command_interface)
87 
88  @staticmethod
89  def get_type():
90  return "no_tool"
91 
92  def validate_command(self, cmd):
93  pass
94 
95  def is_connected(self):
96  state, id_ = self.ros_command_interface.ping_dxl_tool()
97  return state == self._tools_state.PING_OK and id_ == self._id
98 
99 
100 class Gripper(Tool):
101  def __init__(self, tool_id, tool_name, tool_transformation, tools_state, ros_command_interface, specs,
102  hardware_version):
103  super(Gripper, self).__init__(tool_id, tool_name, tool_transformation, tools_state, ros_command_interface)
104  self.hardware_version = hardware_version
105 
106  self.open_position = specs.get("open_position")
107  self.open_hold_torque = specs.get("open_hold_torque")
108  self.open_max_torque = specs.get("open_max_torque")
109  self.close_position = specs.get("close_position")
110  self.close_hold_torque = specs.get("close_hold_torque")
111  self.close_max_torque = specs.get("close_max_torque")
112 
113  self.open_speed_limits = specs.get("limit_open_speed", {'min': 0, 'max': 1000})
114  self.close_speed_limits = specs.get("limit_close_speed", {'min': 0, 'max': 1000})
115  self.torque_limits = specs.get("torque_limit", {'min': -1000, 'max': 1000})
116 
117  self._functions_dict = {
118  "open_gripper": self.open_gripper,
119  "close_gripper": self.close_gripper,
120  }
121 
122  @staticmethod
123  def get_type():
124  return "gripper"
125 
126  def validate_command(self, cmd):
127  if not self.open_speed_limits["min"] <= cmd.speed < self.open_speed_limits["max"]:
128  raise ToolValidationException(
129  "Gripper open speed must be in ( {}, {})".format(self.open_speed_limits["min"],
130  self.open_speed_limits["max"]))
131  elif not self.close_speed_limits["min"] <= cmd.speed < self.close_speed_limits["max"]:
132  raise ToolValidationException(
133  "Gripper close speed must be in ( {}, {})".format(self.close_speed_limits["min"],
134  self.close_speed_limits["max"]))
135 
136  def is_connected(self):
137  state, id_ = self.ros_command_interface.ping_dxl_tool()
138  return state == self._tools_state.PING_OK and id_ == self._id
139 
140  def return_gripper_status(self, state):
141  if state == self._tools_state.GRIPPER_OPEN:
142  return True, "Successfully opened gripper"
143  if state == self._tools_state.GRIPPER_CLOSE:
144  return True, "Successfully closed gripper"
145  if state == self._tools_state.PING_OK:
146  return True, "Gripper is connected"
147  if state == self._tools_state.PING_ERROR:
148  return False, "Gripper not detected"
149  if state == self._tools_state.TIMEOUT:
150  return False, "Gripper action - Timeout"
151  if state == self._tools_state.WRONG_ID:
152  return False, "This gripper is not the one attached"
153  if state == self._tools_state.ROS_COMMUNICATION_PROBLEM:
154  return False, "A communication problem occured, please retry"
155 
156  def open_gripper(self, cmd):
157  # Remap percentage to real torque value
158  max_torque = int(self.remap(cmd.max_torque_percentage, 0, 100, 0, self.torque_limits["max"]))
159  hold_torque = int(self.remap(cmd.hold_torque_percentage, 0, 100, 0, self.torque_limits["max"]))
160 
161  state = self.ros_command_interface.open_gripper(
162  self._id, self.open_position, cmd.speed, hold_torque, max_torque)
163  return self.return_gripper_status(state)
164 
165  def close_gripper(self, cmd):
166  # Remap percentage to real torque value
167  max_torque = int(self.remap(cmd.max_torque_percentage, 0, 100, 0, self.torque_limits["min"]))
168  hold_torque = int(self.remap(cmd.hold_torque_percentage, 0, 100, 0, self.torque_limits["min"]))
169 
170  state = self.ros_command_interface.close_gripper(
171  self._id, self.close_position, cmd.speed, hold_torque, max_torque)
172  return self.return_gripper_status(state)
173 
174  def update_params(self, open_position, open_hold_torque, open_max_torque, close_position,
175  close_hold_torque, close_max_torque):
176  self.open_position = open_position
177  self.open_hold_torque = open_hold_torque
178  self.open_max_torque = open_max_torque
179  self.close_position = close_position
180  self.close_hold_torque = close_hold_torque
181  self.close_max_torque = close_max_torque
182 
183 
184 class Electromagnet(Tool):
185  def __init__(self, tool_id, tool_name, tool_transformation, tools_state, ros_command_interface):
186  super(Electromagnet, self).__init__(tool_id, tool_name, tool_transformation, tools_state, ros_command_interface)
187  self._functions_dict = {
188  "setup_digital_io": self.setup_digital_io,
189  "activate_digital_io": self.activate_digital_io,
190  "deactivate_digital_io": self.deactivate_digital_io,
191  }
192  self._gpio = None
193 
194  @staticmethod
195  def get_type():
196  return "electromagnet"
197 
198  def validate_command(self, cmd):
199  if type(cmd.activate) is not bool:
200  raise ToolValidationException("Electromagnet activation command should be boolean")
201 
202  def setup_digital_io(self, cmd):
203  self._gpio = cmd.gpio
204  status, message = self.ros_command_interface.digital_output_tool_setup(self._gpio)
205  if status == CommandStatus.SUCCESS:
206  return True, 'Successfully setup digital output PIN ' + str(cmd.gpio) + ' for electromagnet'
207  else:
208  return False, message
209 
210  def activate_digital_io(self, cmd):
211  if cmd.gpio != "":
212  self._gpio = cmd.gpio
213  status, message = self.ros_command_interface.digital_output_tool_activate(self._gpio, True)
214  if status == CommandStatus.SUCCESS:
215  return True, 'Successfully activated eletromagnet on PIN ' + str(cmd.gpio)
216  else:
217  return False, message
218 
219  def deactivate_digital_io(self, cmd):
220  if cmd.gpio != "":
221  self._gpio = cmd.gpio
222  status, message = self.ros_command_interface.digital_output_tool_activate(self._gpio, False)
223  if status == CommandStatus.SUCCESS:
224  return True, 'Successfully deactivated eletromagnet on PIN ' + str(cmd.gpio)
225  else:
226  return False, message
227 
228 
229 class VacuumPump(Tool):
230  def __init__(self, tool_id, tool_name, tool_transformation, tools_state, ros_command_interface, specs):
231  super(VacuumPump, self).__init__(tool_id, tool_name, tool_transformation, tools_state, ros_command_interface)
232  self.__pull_air_position = specs["pull_air_position"]
233  self.__pull_air_max_torque = specs["pull_air_max_torque"]
234  self.__pull_air_hold_torque = specs["pull_air_hold_torque"]
235  self.__push_air_position = specs["push_air_position"]
236  self.__push_air_max_torque = specs["push_air_max_torque"]
237 
238  self.__pull_air_velocity = specs.get("pull_air_velocity", 0)
239  self.__push_air_velocity = specs.get("push_air_velocity", 0)
240 
241  self.__torque_limits = specs.get("torque_limit", [0, 1000])
242 
243  self._functions_dict = {
244  "pull_air_vacuum_pump": self.pull_air_vacuum_pump,
245  "push_air_vacuum_pump": self.push_air_vacuum_pump,
246  }
247 
248  @staticmethod
249  def get_type():
250  return "vacuum_pump"
251 
252  def validate_command(self, cmd):
253  if type(cmd.activate) is not bool:
254  raise ToolValidationException("Vacuum Pump activation command should be boolean")
255 
256  def is_connected(self):
257  state = self.ros_command_interface.ping_dxl_tool(self._id, self._name)
258  return state == self._tools_state.PING_OK
259 
260  def return_vaccump_pump_state(self, state):
261  if state == self._tools_state.VACUUM_PUMP_PULLED:
262  return True, 'Successfully pulled air'
263  elif state == self._tools_state.VACUUM_PUMP_PUSHED:
264  return True, 'Successfully pushed air'
265  elif state == self._tools_state.PING_OK:
266  return True, 'Vacuum Pump is connected'
267  elif state == self._tools_state.PING_ERROR:
268  return False, 'Vacuum pump not detected'
269  elif state == self._tools_state.TIMEOUT:
270  return False, 'Vacump pump action - Timeout'
271  elif state == self._tools_state.WRONG_ID:
272  return False, 'This vacuum pump is not the one attached'
273  elif state == self._tools_state.ROS_COMMUNICATION_PROBLEM:
274  return False, "A communication problem occured, please retry"
275  else:
276  return False, "Error : Unknown vacuum pump return" + str(state)
277 
278  def pull_air_vacuum_pump(self, _):
279  state = self.ros_command_interface.pull_air_vacuum_pump(self._id, self.__pull_air_velocity,
280  self.__pull_air_position,
281  self.__pull_air_max_torque,
282  self.__pull_air_hold_torque)
283  return self.return_vaccump_pump_state(state)
284 
285  def push_air_vacuum_pump(self, _):
286  state = self.ros_command_interface.push_air_vacuum_pump(self._id, self.__push_air_velocity,
287  self.__push_air_position,
288  self.__push_air_max_torque)
289  return self.return_vaccump_pump_state(state)
290 
291  def update_params(
292  self, pull_air_velocity, pull_air_position,
293  pull_air_max_torque, pull_air_hold_torque,
294  push_air_velocity, push_air_position, push_air_max_torque):
295  self.__pull_air_velocity = pull_air_velocity
296  self.__pull_air_position = pull_air_position
297  self.__pull_air_max_torque = pull_air_max_torque
298  self.__pull_air_hold_torque = pull_air_hold_torque
299  self.__push_air_velocity = push_air_velocity
300  self.__push_air_position = push_air_position
301  self.__push_air_max_torque = push_air_max_torque
